Simple: Responsive

Background

Fairly basic, but mostly awesome, implementation of using the Simple Grid System. This is a great solution for sites that need to be responsive and simple changes in layouts in different viewports. This is solution is still lightweight coming in around 8K.

Responsive Grid Example
